Invocation Name: my story box
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With My Story Box by Comobi, children create their stories by choosing a location, the characters, and more. Listen to stories adapted from Aesop’s fables, narrated by professional voice actors and mixed with classic music. Ideal for engaging children out of screens and for bedtime!

Description of the content:
All children deserve daily storytelling. So we make all our content available for everyone to enjoy, 15 minutes renewed every day!
- Stories adapted from Aesop’s fables – classical and educational tales for children with great moral
- Audiobook quality, narration by professional voice actors, mixed with classic music
- An ever-growing list of stories available for everyone

How to play a story:
- Follow the guide: build you story by selecting the elements of the stories among the choices proposed
- Say: "Tell me a story with a cat and a bell": ask for what you want in your story
- Say: "Read me The Fox and the Crow" : request the title of the story you want

Comobi FreeTime (free trial available, cancel anytime) 
- unlimited story time - unleash your children's creativity and curiosity!
- bedtime story & timer setting - listen to the stories playlist and have a good night.

This skill requires Alexa’s parental consent by an adult in the household (if not already granted). Visit https://www.amazon.com/myh/vpc/intro?clientId=Alexa_rw_vpc to give consent through your Amazon account.
